import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Checkbox, FormControlLabel, FormLabel, InputLabel, MenuItem, Radio, RadioGroup, Select, TextField } from '@mui/material' import { FormControl } from '@mui/base' import { DemoContainer } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/internals/demo'; import { AdapterDayjs } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/AdapterDayjs'; import { LocalizationProvider } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/LocalizationProvider'; import { DatePicker } from '@mui/x-date-pickers/DatePicker'; import styles from './employeeForm.module.scss' const EmployeeForm = (props) => { // const {handleChange} = props const cities = ['delhi', 'mumbai', 'banglore', 'kolkata', 'pune']; const skills = ['angular', 'react', 'vue', 'nextjs', 'drupal', 'html5', 'css3', 'sass', 'mui', 'material-ui']; const [empData, setEmpData] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", contact: "", city: "", dob: '', skill: "", gender: "" }) const handelOnChange = (key, value) => { setEmpData((prevValue) => ({...prevValue, [key]: value})); } const handelSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(empData) } return (
Name handelOnChange('fullName', e.target.value)} />
Email handelOnChange('email', e.target.value)} />
Contact Number handelOnChange('contact', e.target.value)} />

D.O.B handelOnChange('dob', e)} />
Select Skills
handelOnChange('gender', e.target.value)} > } label="Female" /> } label="Male" /> } label="Other" />
} // defaultChecked label="This is active user" value={empData.isActive} onChange={(value)=>handelOnChange('isActive', value)} />
) } export default EmployeeForm
